sentence.Network_en: They threatened to expel him from his adoptive country.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们威胁将他驱逐出他的移居国。

sentence.Network_en: Galway in Ireland is my adoptive home.
sentence.Network_cn: 爱尔兰的戈尔韦是我的第二故乡。

sentence.Network_en: Raised by adoptive parents , Hill received early encouragement in her musical proclivities.
sentence.Network_cn: 希尔由养父母带大, 从小,她的音乐爱好就受到了鼓励.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : via Old French from Latin adoptivus, from adoptare 'select for oneself' (see adopt)

entry.def: Someone's adoptive family is the family that adopted them.

example.ex: He was brought up by adoptive parents in London.
example.tran: 他由养父母在伦敦抚养长大。

entry.def: Some-one's adoptive country or city is the one that they choose for their home, although they were not born there.

example.ex: They threatened to expel him from his adoptive country...
example.tran: 他们威胁将他驱逐出他的移居国。

example.ex: Galway in Ireland is my adoptive home.
example.tran: 爱尔兰的戈尔韦是我的第二故乡。

means.word_mean: 1. of parents and children; related by adoption;
2. acquired as your own by free choice;

auth_sentence.content: But, look, Cindy and I are adoptive parents.
auth_sentence.res_content: But, look, Cindy and I are adoptive parents.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But, look, Cindy and I are adoptive parents.

auth_sentence.content: Surely the English language is the...most swiftly adoptive in the world.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Surely the English language is the...most swiftly adoptive in the world.

auth_sentence.res_content: The couple also are accused of neglecting a third adoptive child.

stems_affixes.word_buile: adopt[v.采用,收养]+able能……的→adj.可采用的,可收养的
adopt[v.采用,收养]+ive……的→adj.收养关系的,采用的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可以任选的,随意的,非强制的
stems_affixes.word_buile: option[n.选择[权],[商]选择买卖的特权]+al……的→adj.可以任选的,随意的,非强制的
opt视力+ic……的→adj.眼的,视觉的,光学上的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 选择[权],[商]选择买卖的特权
stems_affixes.word_buile: opt选择+ion表名词→n.选择[权],[商]选择买卖的特权
syn共同+ops=opt选择+is→共同选出→摘要
ad一再+opt选择→一再选择出来→采用,采纳

sentences.en: Her adoptive mother was a housekeeper.
She is under an obligation to her adoptive father.
sentences.cn: 她有义务赡养她的养父。
